Key Match Events: Daniel Muñoz scored the first goal for Colombia in the 32nd minute
Jefferson Lerma scored the second goal for Colombia in the 42nd minute
Julio Enciso scored the only goal for Paraguay in the 69th minute
Post-Match Reflections: James Rodríguez expressed his happiness with the win and the team's performance
Luis Díaz expressed confidence in the team's ability to have a good tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas
The referee for the match was Dario Herrera
Others: Colombia maintained an impressive unbeaten run of 19 victories and 5 draws since March 2022
Colombia's next match is against Costa Rica in Glendale, Arizona, while Paraguay will face Brazil in Las Vegas
